h1: YOU CAN CHANGE YOUR REGION LATER IN THE SETTINGS PANEL IN THE BOTTOM RIGHT OF THE SCREEN.
h2: TO GET STARTED, SELECT A PRODUCT YOU'D LIKE TO LEARN MORE ABOUT.
h3: WANT TO EARN BONUS POINTS? RETRY ANY PRODUCT CHALLENGE AND TRY TO GET A PERFECT SCORE.
h4: YOU CAN EARN MORE POINTS BY COMPLETING MORE PRODUCT CHALLENGES.
h5: SELECT MORE ON THE DASHBOARD TO SEE THE FULL ACHIEVEMENT, RANK, PRODUCT LIST.
h6: EARN THE DAILY STREAK BONUS BY COMPLETING 4 CHALLENGES IN A ROW.
h7: SELECT CLIENT PROPOSALS TO PUT YOUR SOLUTIONS KNOWLEDGE TO THE TEST.
h8: KEEP GOING! YOU'VE NEARLY EARNED YOUR DAILY STREAK BONUS!
h9: YOU CAN GET A PERFECT BONUS BY SCORING 100% IN A CHALLENGE.
h10: SELECT THE BACK BUTTON TO RETURN TO THE PRODUCT NETWORK.
h11: YOU’LL NEED AN EYE FOR DETAIL AND PLENTY OF PRODUCT KNOWLEDGE TO WIN THESE CLIENT PROPOSALS.
h12: YOU’LL NEED TO REVIEW ALL THE RESOURCES TO DETERMINE THIS CLIENT’S NEEDS.
h13: FIND THE PERFECT SOLUTION FOR THIS CLIENT BY MATCHING THEIR NEEDS TO OUR PRODUCTS.
